author: alito
text:
560 U. S. ____ (2010)560 U. S. ____ (2010)560 U. S. ____ (2010)SUPREME COURT OF THE UNITED STATESNO. 08-1555MOHAMED ALI SAMANTAR, PETITIONERv.BASHE
ABDI YOUSUF et al.on writ of certiorari to the united states court of
appeals for the fourth circuit[June 1, 2010]Justice Alito, concurring.I join the opinion of the Court,
although I think that the citations to legislative history are of
little if any value here.
